author: djrtwo
content:
eth2 netwokring call 0 tomorrow at 1pm UTC.
I just added a more extensive list of topics to the agenda. Please comment below if I have missed things
https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0-pm/issues/106

The format moving forward is still tbd, but on this first call, our primary goal is to enumerate the problems at hand, hear about the state of the problems, and ensure that we don't have any blind spots. 

I will share a link to the call here 10 minutes before

author: eth2_gitter_bot
content: <DBrettRobertson> <@291925846556540928> just confirming is it 2pm UTC rather than 1pm UTC?

author: djrtwo
content: It is, in fact, 1pm UTC (as opposed to many of our other calls at 2pm UTC)

author: djrtwo
content: between the phase 2 call today, the light client call tomorrow, and the eth2 call on thursday and some other commitments I couldn't find a better time this week :/ and didn't want to wait until the following. I'm not committed to this time moving forward and can try to find a less busy week in the future!

author: prestonvanloon
content: all good! will listen to the recording if unable to attend, thanks
